title: Bad news. Doom the movie just got stupider.
content:
[url=http://chud.com/news/690]chud.com/news/690[/url]

Seriously, though. What's the point of making a movie based on a game if they share nothing in common? THIS MAKES NO SENSE.-----
Before you judge someone, walk a mile in their shoes. You'll be a mile away and have their shoes!
